reviews.review: 很刺激

160小时。就嗯出皮肤，这新气场是哪个··想的，钩子都看不见，地下室钩子更是完全看不见，挂了人之后倒是明显的一批。还有更新之后不结算的问题，我打了两天了百分之80的局都没结算，这他妈怎么玩？

740小时更新。司马游戏，玩人类能匹配十分钟，玩屠夫把把高血压。现在跟朋友玩人类全程笑嘻嘻，一点紧迫感都没有，摸宝找蘑菇随便逛，给屠夫当猴耍，玩个尼玛屠夫开局捡俩夹子放我都感觉浪费时间了，稍微被拖一下机就没了。现在完全是屠夫被人类压迫，这游戏怎么进行主动权全在人类手里，屠夫除了像个哈皮拿着刀追人一点体验都没有，说实话不如把AI做好点，屠夫全用AI算了，真是个司马游戏，下版本还出恩赐图腾，我去尼玛我赶紧溜了，现在后悔的就是我还给这司马游戏充那么多钱，操他妈的。
juegardo,con amigos el doble de divertido

May 4th, 2022 The community is by far the worst part about this game, but that's just a people problem. The game isn't very nice to most players which is kinda why everyone runs meta perks and uses them religiously. Personally the gameplay issues are embedded in how everyone has fun by using broken perks and that puts weaker killers at a disadvantage so be nice when you blow a weaker killer out of the water. 

As of June 12 2021 I like this game again

Ok I am gonna rewrite this review, the latest update as of Feb 9, 21 has made the game a steaming pile of shit. I actually really hate the new HUD and locomotion. I physically cannot 360 anymore and that was my favorite thing, the dev team refuses to make the changes we ask for and have just wasted my time. They are killing this game, please do not buy it and boycott these changes, then buy it. 

Although I have been banned from the community for being toxic, I have had an amazing time with this game. IT IS WORTH THE PRICE and even more so if you get it for less. Hitboxes are occasionally the problem, but this game has an amazing learning curve and provides a unique experience not found elsewhere. This game has serious HIGHS and LOWS, yet it can get very frustrating. Going into the game understanding that you can lose in the first few minutes and that's okay is key to success. Keep being persistent and learn from any possible errors, don't lose hope some days are better than others. There's nothing like 360ing your first killer or mindgaming your victims to success. You can unlock almost everything from just playing the game. Please try this game if you especially enjoy beating others not by your might but by your ingenuity. I hope you buy this game and have just as good of a time as I did! Welcome to The Mist Survivors and Killers, strap in and get ready for the chases of your lives!

not epic at all.

The game tries to incorporate a "Ranked" System that's terribly broken.  The game decided instead to punish players for the flawed worthless system by causing all DC's to be punished by an ever growing system to disuade disconnects however they fail to address the problem. 90% of my disconnects can be asscociated with completely unbalanced setups.  IE. I play killer at rank 10 and end up with rank <6 survivors so I end up stomped.  The game expects me to completely my game and waste more time for a garenteed loss than it expects a DC for a faulty system.  The same goes true for survivors where I'll either stomp the killer with my fellow survivors or get stomped by the killer.  There never is an inbetween and the creators seem thing feel bandaid solutions are the best course for the game.  They don't care about longevity, but milking new users for as much money as possible.

I'm pretty into this game! While there are sometimes issues, the devs usually address them. The community isn't as toxic as some games, and this remains one of the best current multiplayer games out there right now. Hard to start for some that are new to the game,  but you have eternity to figure it out :)

Quick warning: Matchmaking is very, VERY sketchy. Survivors queueing together get matched with a killer based on the lowest rank, meaning a group of 3 very skilled, experienced survivors with one newbie in the group could be matched with a very new killer. This killer is very likely to be you. Learning the more active role in this game can be downright infuriating due to how matches are made.

Also, ich hab dieses Spiel neulich auf Youtube entdeckt und fande dass es sehr cool aussah und ich wollte es daraufhin mal ausprobieren. Also habe ich mir das Spiel gekauft und beim ersten Start ist erstmal der Pc abgeschmiert. Irgendwann vor einiger Zeit hat es irgendwie für ein paar runden funktioniert, keine Ahnung warum. Ich war Happy aber plötzlich mitten in einer RTunde war es dann auch hwieder vorbei, absturz. Hab daraufhin die spieldateien überprüft alles okay. Grafiktreiber aktuell. Systemanforderungen bei weitem übertroffen. Spiel deinstalliert und erneut installiert. Starte das Spiel. anfangscutscene überstanden, dann im Ladebildschirm...schwarzer Bildschirm, Pc gecrasht. Also das find ich auf jeden Fall nicht Bockhaftig dass das Spiel jedes mal kurz nach dem Start alles crashen lässt. Schade, sah echt cool aus...

I really didn't like this game the story is ok but not anything special, there are certain bosses that are copy pastes for example Grimm and Nightmare King Grimm are copies of Gruz mother one of earliest bosses. Radiance, Absolute Radiance, The Hollow Knight, Pure Vessel, God Tamer, Hornet, The Nail Masters, and False Knight are all copies of The Watcher Knights the hardest boss in the game by far and a very cancer fight. Over all not fun not to mention it this game is a Darksouls Clone

民度もバランスもとっくに崩壊しているが、それでもこのゲームにしかない魅力がある。
味方と協力して逃げられた時の興奮も、初めて全滅をとれた時の快感も、一人取り残されハッチ脱出できた時の恐怖と安堵がないまぜになった感情も、初めてランク１になれた時の感動も。
一度味わってしまえば、もうこの霧の中から脱出することなんてできない。日々、殺し、殺され、逃げて、逃げられて。
また一段と、この世界の虜になってゆく。

問題点も数え切れないほどにありますが、そこに目を瞑ってでもまたやりたくなる中毒性がこのゲームにはあります。
初心者にとっては、サバイバー、キラーどちらも辛いものですが...乗り越えれば、楽しい時間が待っていることでしょう。保証は出来かねますが。
あ、ついでにメンタルも強くなります。なぜかは言いません。
[spoiler] 煽るカスはとっととﾀﾋね。 [/spoiler]
サバイバーもキラーも、中には人がいることを忘れずにプレイしてください。
ここまで見てくれたあなたに、エンティティ様のご加護がありますように。
